meanings.definition: The act of translating something back into the original language.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed comparing the retranslations of the ancient text.
meanings.sent2: The retranslations of the poem brought out new nuances.
meanings.sent3: The retranslations of the recipe made it sound like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: His retranslations of the song lyrics revealed hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: The retranslations of the document were clearer than the original.

meanings.definition: A new translation of a previously translated text.
meanings.sent1: The author decided to create retranslations of his famous works.
meanings.sent2: The retranslations of the novel captured the essence of the original.
meanings.sent3: The retranslations of the play made the characters speak in rhymes.
meanings.sent4: Her retranslations of the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The retranslations of the article were more accurate than the first version.
